home.subtagline: Pulih@thePeak supports prevention efforts especially in the field of mental health for you and your family. Maintaining and taking care of the person's mental health from an early age will positively impact daily life in the family, education, work, and social relationships.

about.title: About Pulih@thePeak
about.description: Pulih@thePeak was founded on 21st of April  2014, dedicated to the sustainability of the Pulih Foundation as a non-profit organization that has been active since 2002 in the recovery of psychological trauma.

psychological.title: Psychologist at Pulih@thePeak
psychological.description: Our professional psychologists are always ready to listen to you anywhere and anytime.

quotes.supeli: “Parents are an essential parties who really determine the physical & mental health (mental and spiritual) of their children. The parenting style provided and the relationship between parents-children will shape the child's mental health. Therefore, it is important to form a strong personality base so that it is not easily influenced by the social environment.”
quotes.soraya: “Don't forget to do self-reflection as a process of learning to know and accept yourself better as you are with high spirit of improvement. You don't need to be a perfect person, just maintain consistency, struggle with your strengths and weaknesses.”
quotes.retno: “Healthy roles have a big impact on mental health and happiness. Roles can relieve stress, provide comfort, joy, and prevent loneliness.”

faq.title: What Can We Help?
faq.question_1: How do I register for counseling at Pulih@thePeak?
faq.answer_1: Hello, if you want to do consult registration you can contact us through WhatsApp at 085103209515
faq.question_2: What types of consultations does Pulih@thePeak provide?
faq.answer_2: We provide any types of consultations including: Psychological and Psychotherapy Counseling (individual and group), Premarital Counseling, Marriage Counseling, Family Counseling, Family Financial Counseling, Career Consultation
faq.question_3: Can counseling at Pulih@thePeak be done offline?
faq.answer_3: Counseling activities can be carried out online (Zoom/Chat) and offline. “Offline” counseling can only be done if you have received approval from a psychologist through online counseling first
faq.question_4: How long does a counseling session last?
faq.answer_4: The counseling session was carried out for 75 minutes

merchandise.title: Shop Our Merchandise
merchandise.description: With the dedication and love of the Pulih team for our clients. We present Merchandise made with love that you can own.

about.title: About Pulih@thePeak
about.description: Pulih@thePeak is a social entrepreneurship founded on April 21 2014, which is dedicated as a continuation of the Pulih Foundation, a non-profit organization that has been active since 2002 in the recovery of psychological and psychosocial trauma.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become a leading support center for women, youth and family empowerment in Indonesia and International.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Providing services and support for women, teenagers, families and the community through various empowerment programs that are curative, preventive and educational in nature to build healthy, prosperous and happy families.

services.title: Pulih@thePeak Services
services.description: We have helped various personal and family problems. With the services we provide, you can consult anywhere and anytime because we believe your mental health is our priority.

categories.title: Pulih@thePeak Service Categories
categories.description: With Pulih@thePeak, you can consult with a psychologist according to your needs

individual.title: Individual Counseling
individual.description: One on one psychological consultation (1 psychologist and 1 client). Examples: work stress, personal anxiety, problems at school, etc.

couples.title: Couples Counseling
couples.description: Couples psychological consultation (1 psychologist with partner or 2 clients). Examples: communication with partners, communication with family members, etc.

family.title: Family Counseling
family.description: Family psychological consultation (1 psychologist with family such as father / mother / siblings / grandmother / grandfather). Examples: communication with partners, communication with family members, etc.

psychological.title: Psychological Examination
psychological.description: Providing psychological tests to clients for the purpose of assessing the client's psychological condition or for educational and employment purposes. Example: for clinical disorders, for educational aptitude test purposes.

workshop.title: Examination/Workshop
workshop.description: Learn and practice skills aimed at empowering women, youth development, strengthening families, mental health, and maintaining one's psychological condition.

webinars.title: Seminars/Webinars
webinars.description: Study various topics related to psychological theory and mental health.

why.title: Why Pulih@thePeak?
why.second: Uphold the professional code of ethics
why.third: Have a deep understanding of gender perspectives

psychological.title: Professional Psychologists
psychological.description: Our professional psychologists are licensed and have helped thousands of personal and family problems. Your safety and comfort is our priority so that you get the best solution from experts.

merchandise.description: With the dedication and love of the Pulih team for our clients. We present Merchandise made with love that you can own.

livia-istania.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia (1988-1994). Received a Master of Science degree in Psychological Counseling from City University, London (1996-1997). Obtained a Doctor of Public Health (DrPH) degree from the University of Hawaii at Manoa with a full scholarship from the East West Center (2009-2012). 

Livia Iskandar has experience including as National Manager for the UNFPA and UNIFEM Violence Against Women Program. Became the Coordinator for the Development of Service Systems for Violence Survivors at the National Commission Against Violence against Women. Livia Iskandar is also one of the founders of Pulih Foundation and in 2014 founded Pulih@thePeak together with her colleagues.
Available: Online & Offline

soraya-salim.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia. Became a psychology volunteer at the Pulih Foundation which has been working in the field of post-traumatic recovery since 2005 and was the Project Leader in collaboration between the Pulih Foundation and UN Women for the Stop Violence Against Women and Girls campaign. 

In 2014, Soraya Salim founded Pulih@thePeak together with her colleague, Livia Iskandar, who is also a senior psychologist. Soraya Salim has work experience including as a consultant at Daya Dimensi Indonesia in the field of assessment and as a researcher at Asia Market Intelligence.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Experienced in Market Research and Corporate

dyah-paramita.profile:
Psychologist graduated from the University of Indonesia, licensed and has more than 12 years of experience handling counseling for adults and young adults, individually, in couples, families and groups.
Available: Online & Offline

wulan-ayu.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology and Master of Adult Clinical Profession, University of Indonesia. Wulan has been a practicing Clinical Psychologist since 2008 and handles many cases related to anxiety, depression, trauma in relationships, as well as marriage and family issues.

Wulan is also currently a Psychologist at the Ministry of Social Affairs' Trauma Center Protection House which provides psychosocial protection and recovery for victims of violence (gender violence, domestic violence, and human trafficking).
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: A Licensed Clinical Psychologist providing Psychotherapy

agustina-indrawati.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology and Master of Professional Psychology program majoring in Industrial and Organizational Psychology from University of Indonesia. Completed Loop Certified Professional Coach and Hogan Assessment Certification programs. Member of the Indonesian Psychological Association (HIMPSI) and the Association of Indonesian Clinical Psychologists (IPK Indonesia).

Currently providing the services/practices of Clinical Psychology and Counseling related to mental health improvement for adolescent and adult clients. In addition, carrying out coaching activities to find a more meaningful life (life coaching), as well as career coaching. Becoming a freelance contributor of the psychoeducation series “Anak Muda Keren Paham KesMen (Kesehatan Mental)” on the website of Kompasiana.

Agustina Indrawati is also involved in the Employee Assistance Programs (EAP) for clients within the organizations which aim to maintain mental health and well-being of the employees and their family members. Having work experience as an HR Practitioner in several multinational companies and international organizations, such as the World Bank Group and the United Nations.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Stress, anxiety disorders, depression, and trauma
Personal development, interpersonal relationships, premarital/couple/family relationships
Career development, performance, and relationships in the work environment

ammy-kadarharutami.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Padjadjaran University, majoring in Adult Clinical and Master of Professional Psychology, Padjadjaran University, majoring in Child Clinical. Experienced as a practitioner and consultant in several companies. Currently managing a consulting company which operates in the field of HR management. Accustomed to playing the role of trainer, facilitator and assessor in the industrial world as well as counselor and professional coach for individuals.
Available: Online & Offline

viera-adella.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Padjadjaran University, majoring in Adult Clinical and Master of Professional Psychology, Padjadjaran University, majoring in Child Clinical. Experienced as a consultant in several companies. Currently he serves as a lecturer in Psychology and a lecturer in the Master of Professional Psychology Education Program in the Clinical Department at Atma Jaya University and as a Psychologist in Charge (Project Leader) at the Sriwijaya Polytechnic Faculty, Palembang.

Has workshop experience in various institutions as a “coach” to refresh the use of diagnostic tools in industry and organizations, especially for assessors.
Available: Online & Offline

astarini-retno.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia. Has more than 20 years of experience in the fields of counseling, training, assessment and personal development. Astarini Retno or better known as Ajeng Raviando is active as a Psychologist at Taman Hati Konseling and Pulih@thePeak. Apart from that, she is also a Facilitator at Talk inc Jakarta and at Look Modeling School Jakarta. He is also active as a seminar speaker, television source, and writer for various media in Indonesia.
Available: Online & Offline

raymond-tambunan.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia and received a Master's degree in Anthropology from the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, University of Indonesia. Apart from having more than twelve years of teaching experience at universities, Raymond Tambunan is also a certified hypnotherapist.

His activities while serving as a lecturer made him attached to research. His research topics range from social intervention to self-development. From 2008 to 2010 he served as Director of the AIDS Research Center at Atma Jaya University, Jakarta. He was the Coordinator for Increasing Indonesian Research Capacity at the University of Illinois, Chicago, in 2011-2013.
Available: Online & Offline

andi-miriam.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Department of Development, University of Surabaya. Has experience, among others, in the field of Developmental Psychology: conducting examinations and consultations related to children's growth and development and maturity. Educational Psychology Sector: carries out examinations and consultations related to measuring students' intelligence and interests & talents. Field of Industrial Psychology: conducting assessments and feedback related to competency fulfillment, recruitment and promotion.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Child psychologists are concerned with the growth and development and maturity of children
Involves measuring students' intelligence and talent interests
Counseling for premarital and marital relationships

yeni-duriana.profile:
Pursuing Masters in Clinical Professional Psychology at Gadjah Mada University. Currently actively practicing counseling and psychotherapy at the Psychological Services Unit, Faculty of Psychology, Esa Unggul University. Apart from that, he also works as a permanent lecturer at the Faculty of Psychology, at Esa Unggul University, teaching courses in clinical psychology, psychopathology, psychotherapy.

Has an interest in depression, anxiety, relationships between couples (husband and wife or family), adolescent problems and issues related to violence against women and children.

ika-putri-dewi.profile:
Ika Putri Dewi, child and teenager psychologist, who has joined the PULIH Foundation since 2011 and now (as of 2022) joining the Pulih@thePeak family. Ika graduated from Atmajaya Bachelor's degree in 1993, and graduated from psychology in 2000.

Clinical care for children/children and adolescents with various emotional disorders

widaningrum.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Padjadjaran University. Has more than 20 years of experience in the field of Human Resources development, organizational development, assessment, counseling (individuals/employees). Widaningrum also handles projects related to HR development in both state-owned and private organizations. Apart from that, he is also an HR practitioner at a corporation and a consultant at a consulting agency.
Available: Online & Offline

abas-supeli.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Padjadjaran University and the Master of Science Program from Leiden University. Growing well-being as a clinical psychologist by becoming a teaching assistant in his field. Experienced in the field of human resources in various macro-national companies and as an assessor for multi-national companies.

Received a Master's scholarship program through StuNed (Studeren In Nederland) where he studied “Health Psychology” which can be implemented in Indonesia as a combination of Clinical Psychology and Industrial and Organizational Psychology. Abbas Supeli took a doctoral degree at Griffith University in Australia and is a member of MAREAA (Marriage and Relationship Educators Association of Australia).
Available: Online & Offline

mersedes-tanok.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, Department of Development, Padjadjaran University. Work experience as a recruiter for one of Astra's subsidiaries and then held several managerial positions in the field of Human Resources at multinational companies. Served as Talent and Acquisition General Manager at a commodity company in Jakarta until 2017.

Mersedes Tanok was invited several times by state universities in Jakarta as a speaker on the world of work and was involved in assisting Atma Jaya psychology students in handling casuistry. In 2017 decided to focus on the world of counseling.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Helps deal with Learning Difficulties in Children
Concerning Psychological Problems in Children and Adults

diah-astarini.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia in 1994. She took the Educational & Helping Child Course in 1995 at the same Faculty and University. A certified hypnotherapist, certified negotiation specialist, and marketing strategist.

Experienced in the field of training and speaker at several events including “The Role of Parents in the Cognitive Thinking Ability of Toddlers” (Gramedia-1998), “Don't Run From Your Problems” (dbb/vertigo-2004), and “Self-Motivation for a Better Life Good” (SMART Concept-Manulife Indonesia 2008).
Available: Online & Offline

danny-irawan.profile:
Danny I Yatim graduated from Universitas Gadjah Mada, Connecticut College and Harvard University and has more than 40 years of practical and academic experience in the fields of behavior change, health promotion, intercultural communications and social marketing.  He has worked as consultant in various public health programs, mostly related to HIV-AIDS, sexuality, and drug matters.

For over 20 years he served as adjunct lecturer in psychology at Atma Jaya Catholic University of Indonesia and as adjunct lecturer for the International Program in Communications at the University of Indonesia.

He has facilitated various workshops in Indonesia and abroad on matters related to interpersonal communications, counselor training, diversity awareness, personal development for youth, active aging for the elderly, and writing workshops (including memoir writing for Pulih@The Peak).
Available: Online & Offline

rika-ermasari.profile:
Has 20 years of experience as an HR Executive. Rika continues to pursue her passion as a psychologist to this day and has received certification as a coach from ICF and has many certifications in the field of Psychotherapy and continues to update her skills as a therapist.
Available: Online & Offline

ariesti-pritawati.profile:
Adult Clinical Psychologist studying Masters in Professional Psychology majoring in Adult Clinical at Unika Atma Jaya Jakarta. Currently actively practicing counseling and psychotherapy for clients aged 17 years and over.

Ariesti has an interest in issues surrounding relationships (couple relationships, mother-child relationships, etc.) and optimizing individual roles. Apart from that, he is also active as a casuistry supervisor for students of the Adult Clinical Psychologist profession at the Faculty of Psychology, Unika Atma Jaya Jakarta.

skills_detail: Individual counseling: relationships, self-adjustment, role optimization, etc.

Shanen Emily is a graduate of the Professional Masters in Adult Clinical Psychology at UNIKA Atma Jaya. Have an interest in issues related to the emotional well-being of individuals in families and couple relationships.

Apart from that, Shanen also handles problems in adolescents and adults, especially in the areas of self-development, career and interpersonal relationships. Shanen also handles a number of stress cases related to physical health conditions. Currently, Shanen also actively acts as an assessor for company recruitment purposes.
Available: Online & Offline

prita-pradipta.profile:
Prita Pradipta is a graduate of the UNIKA Atma Jaya Adult Clinical Professional Psychology Masters Degree. Prita has an interest in issues related to individual self-growth and couple relationships. Prita also has experience dealing with problems related to anxiety, depression, stress management, infidelity in romantic relationships, and LGBT.
Available: Online & Offline

bella-amanda.profile:
Bella Amanda Maharani is a child and teenagers clinical psychologist who graduated from Padjadjaran University. Has an interest in children and youth issues. Experienced in conducting clinical assessments, talent interests, and parent counseling.
Available: Online & Offline

hanina-maulidha.profile:
Hanina Maulidha is an Educational Psychologist who graduated from the Master of Professional Psychology at UNTAR (Tarumanegara University). Apart from that, she is the Founder of @speakupnow.id which is a Social Enterprise engaged in Public Speaking and Psychology Education for Children and Teenagers. Hanina is also active as a Counselor for Violence against Women and Children at P2TP2A DKI Jakarta Province and is a School Psychologist at one of the Private Middle Schools in Jakarta.
Available: Online & Offline

angellia-lestari.profile:
Angellia Lestari Christiani, more familiarly known as Angel, is a graduate of Adult Clinical Psychology from Unika Atma Jaya Jakarta. Her interest in relationship and sexual orientation issues can be seen from her experience in counseling individuals and couples on related topics. Angel has joined Pulih@thePeak since 2019, and is active as a speaker at various Webinars and Training. Angel is also an honorary lecturer at a private university in Jakarta. Currently, Angel is also doing counseling at @cepatkan.id and @grome (Grow with Fame Consultant).
Available: Online Only

rami-busyra.profile:
Rami is a graduate of the UI Professional Masters in Psychology. As an adult clinical psychologist, Rami has an interest in areas of psychology related to chronic illness, trauma, stress and work performance, pre-marital and marital relationships.

In her practice, Rami typically uses cognitive-behavioral therapy, mindfulness, and ACT approaches; with an evidence-based orientation. Rami is also active as a psychological intervention consultant at an applied psychology institute; and has been invited several times to be a webinar speaker, online mini class, and magazine contributor. In his busy schedule, Rami makes time to be involved in various volunteer activities to help improve the psychological well-being of society.
Available: Online Only
skills_detail: Interests in the field of healthy mind-body

niken-paramita.profile:
Adult clinical psychologist who received a bachelor's degree from the Faculty of Psychology, Unika Atma Jaya and the Master's Program in Adult Clinical Profession at Unika Atma Jaya. Has experience, among others, in the field of Educational Psychology: conducting examinations and consultations related to measuring intelligence, interests and talents of students, as well as dealing with learning difficulties in children and adolescents. In the field of Industrial Psychology: conducting assessments and feedback related to competency, recruitment and promotion.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Involves measuring students intelligence and talent interests
Help children and teenagers with learning difficulties

shinta-utami.profile:
Shinta Utami is a 2017 graduate of the Professional Masters in Adult Clinical Psychology at Tarumanagara University. Currently actively practicing as a Clinical Psychologist at Pulih at The Peak from 2017 until now and Infinity Main Clinic from 2021 until now. In the industrial environment, Shinta has been involved with PPM Management for the recruitment process and with other psychology bureaus since 2017 until now. Apart from that, his experience was as a lecturer in 2017 – 2020 at Prof. University. Dr. Hamka Jakarta and Mercu Buana University Jakarta.
Available: Online Only

rini-ariani.profile:
Rini Ariani, S.Psi., M.Psi., Psychologist, is an educational psychologist with over 15 years of experience working with children and adolescents. She completed her Bachelor's degree in Psychology at Paramadina University through the Paramadina Fellowship program, fully funded by Newmont Mining Corporation, and earned a Master's degree in Child and Adolescent Educational Psychology from Atma Jaya University, Jakarta. Rini has actively contributed to various educational institutions, including Al-Izhar Islamic School in Pondok Labu. Currently, Rini is active at the Inspirasi Pembelajar Foundation as director of experiential-based learning and school psychologist, and practices at Inspirasi Consulting. She is also involved in professional development through her role as a central administrator of the Indonesian Educational Psychology Association (HIMPSI).

Services Offered:
1. Psychological Assessment: Examination of cognitive abilities and learning styles, identification of learning difficulties and the needs of children with special needs (ABK), and assessment of children's social-emotional development.
2. Educational Intervention: Remedial learning programs for students with learning disabilities, inclusive learning design for students with special needs, and academic counseling related to time management and learning motivation.
3. Educational Guidance and Counseling: Individual and group sessions for academic or behavioral issues, as well as outreach on topics such as bullying, exam stress, puberty, and peer pressure.
4. Student Mentoring: Social skills training and life skills development for children and adolescents.
5. Teacher and Parent Consultations: Recommendations for learning strategies tailored to students' psychological needs and parenting workshops on various child and adolescent development topics.

Special Mental Health Services:
1. Early Detection of Mental Problems: Screening for emotional disorders such as anxiety, stress, and depression, and identifying deviant behaviors such as bullying or self-harm.
2. Mental Health Intervention: Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) for children and adolescents, and trauma counseling after crisis events such as disasters or violence.
3. Mental Health Promotion: Mental health education and awareness campaigns in schools, as well as stress management and emotion regulation training.
Available: Online Only

upik.profile:
Graduated from the Faculty of Psychology, University of Surabaya (Ubaya) Surabaya, in 1993. She joined as a professional human resource in a private company in Jakarta and then opened a Psychology Bureau. Until now, she has also worked as a Counselor, Assessor and Psychologist Associate in several Psychology Bureaus.
Available: Online & Offline

silvia-hanny.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology, Maranatha University Bandung, and Master of Professional Psychology majoring in Adult Clinical, Atma Jaya University Jakarta. Has experience, among others, in the field of Educational Psychology, conducting examinations related to intelligence as well as interests & talents. In the Industrial & Organizational sector, carry out assessments and feedback related to competency provision, recruitment and promotion. In the Clinical area, performs individual counseling. Currently serves as a psychology lecturer and case supervisor at the Master of Professional Psychology, Adult Clinical Department, Atma Jaya University.
Available: Online Only

sylvia-dewi.profile:
Unika Atma Jaya Clinical Professional Psychology Masters graduate. Starting a career in the industrial organization sector, then delving into clinical professional psychology. Has an interest in various mental health issues, such as depression, anxiety, trauma, and grief. Sylvia also has an interest in dynamics and relationships within families, especially in families with children with special needs. She has experience in organizing various self-development programs, both individual, group, and organizational. Sylvia believes that every individual has their own uniqueness and potential, and has the opportunity to realize it.
Available: Online & Offline
skills_detail: Relationships and dynamics within the family

sri-susanti.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology at the University of Surabaya with a focus on the clinical field.Experience in education serves as a learning opportunity to better understand adolescents with their diverse life stories. Transitioning into the industrial and organizational field, participates in activities related to competency fulfillment, recruitment, and promotions. 

In the clinical field, works with individuals facing various life issues leading to the emergence of various disorders such as anxiety, trauma, and workplace problems. Experienced in handling couples, both unmarried and those already in marriage, as well as addressing family issues.
Available: Online & Offline

frisca-priscilia.profile:
Frisca is an Adult Clinical Psychologist who obtained her professional degree from Universitas Tarumanagara. Prior to that, she completed her Bachelor's of Science (B.Sc Hons) degree from City University of London and Master's of Science (M.Sc) degree from University of Surrey. As an Indonesian citizen who lived in the UK for 5 years, she has the competence of working with various clients coming from different cultural backgrounds.

Frisca is mostly working with clients ranging from late teenagers to adults. She implements various evidence-based treatment in her therapy sessions, tailored towards the clients specific needs.
Available: Online & Offline

prasti-wardani.profile:
A Psychologist and a practitioner in Human Resource and Organizational Development, with more than 15 years of experience in multinational companies. Her expertise includes talent development, organizational capability building, and human capital transformation. Beyond her professional career, she has personal experience as a caregiver to her late father, who lived with Alzheimer’s disease. This journey strengthened her dedication and commitment to elderly care and family support. Currently, she also serves as a Professional Partner at Pulih at The Peak, focusing on consultation and support for caregivers of Alzheimer’s patients and the elderly.
Available: Online & Offline

veny-oktaviani.profile:
Veny Oktaviani is a Clinical Psychologist who graduated from Universitas Tarumanagara. As a Clinical Psychologist, Veny is dedicated to helping individuals thrive by promoting emotional well-being and resilience. Veny offers personalized, evidence-based support in a compassionate and safe environment—empowering people to overcome challenges and lead more balanced, fulfilling lives. Passionate about the field of Forensic Psychology and Child Development.
Available: Online & Offline

nabila-nafisa.profile:
Nabila Nafisa completed her Professional Master’s Degree in Clinical Psychology at Universitas Gadjah Mada. She has a strong interest in career guidance and talent development. Nabila is experienced in administering and interpreting psychological assessments, particularly those related to intelligence, personality, interests, and aptitudes, to help individuals understand their potential and make informed educational and career decisions.
Available: Online & Offline

wrenges-widyastuti.profile:
Wrenges Widyastuti is an accountant who also continued her Masters in Development Management at the Asian Institute of Management, Manila, until he obtained a Master in Development Management (MDM). Started her career as an auditor at the Ministry of Finance of the Republic of Indonesia in 1987. Experienced working in several private companies, namely Nestle, Natra Raya, and Price Waterhouse, before finally focusing on strengthening financial management in various NGOs starting in 2005.

Her interest to personal financial issues means her preference is stuck at Pulih@thePeak. Wrenges Widyastuti conducts various financial literacy training. Apart from that, we also provide personal financial consultations to clients who need them. Her interest to financial literacy issues encouraged her to focus more on researching these issues, so she is currently pursuing doctoral studies at FEB Gadjahmada University.

irene-sirait.profile:
Graduate of the Faculty of Psychology, University of Indonesia, who had the opportunity to deepen the problem of HIV/AIDS at Melbourne University, Melbourne, Australia and Health Management Systems at Galillee College, Israel.

Has 30 years++ career experience in various Asian-African countries with various international humanitarian agencies and the UN as the person responsible for humanitarian programs, both post-disaster psychosocial emergency response programs and mental health programs. In Indonesia, Irene Sirait was involved in leading psychosocial emergency responses in various post-disaster situations such as the earthquake and tsunami in Aceh to Central Sulawesi.
